original_title: สงกรานต์ แสบสะท้านโลกันต์
overview: A Thai comedy that revolves around a boxing gym that`s about to close down due to financial strains. The owner is trying his best to save it, even forcing his son to train so the son can make money as a boxer. Unfortunately, his son is more interested in music than boxing. Then the weak but determined Songkran volunteers to do it instead.
title: Boxing Sangkran
